For all hair types The Original Recipe: Rosemary Sage Mint: stimulate scalp microcirculation fortify refresh Nettle: helps to balance scalp Soy protein: smoothes and conditions hair No silicon no paraben no colorant. soy protein derivative. Aqua/Water
column38: Linalool Back to the ingredients list. Apply a small amount of shampoo on wet hair then massage in the scalp with circular movements with your fingertips. Add water to create some lather and massage in again. For long hair lather down to the ends of hair without rubbing. Rinse thoroughly.
